com.blahti.example.drag2

Interface DragSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DragLayer

    public interface DragSource
    Interface defining an object where drag operations originate.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allowDrag()
      This method is called to determine if the DragSource has something to drag.
      void onDropCompleted(View target, boolean success)
      This method is called on the completion of the drag operation so the DragSource knows whether it succeeded or failed.
      void setDragController(DragController dragger)
      This method is used to tell the DragSource which drag controller it is working with.

    • Method Detail

      • allowDrag

        boolean allowDrag()
        This method is called to determine if the DragSource has something to drag.
        Returns:
        True if there is something to drag

      • setDragController

        void setDragController(DragController dragger)
        This method is used to tell the DragSource which drag controller it is working with.
        Parameters:
        dragger - DragController

      • onDropCompleted

        void onDropCompleted(View target,
                   boolean success)
        This method is called on the completion of the drag operation so the DragSource knows whether it succeeded or failed.
        Parameters:
        target - View - the view that accepted the dragged object
        success - boolean - true means that the object was dropped successfully
